step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Keep those fingers open and relaxed as you exhale.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Excellent work stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you return to the starting position.
You're completing the repetitions well. Continue to focus on the full range of motion and controlled breathing for each step.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms fully stretched overhead with fingers open, and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. Breathe deeply and relax as you return to the start.
